headline.seo: 2 More New York Deaths Are Linked to Swine Flu
headline.print_headline: Two More Deaths in the City Are Connected to Swine Flu
headline.main: Two More Deaths in City Reported From Swine Flu

docs.lead_paragraph: With the deaths of two New Yorkers — both in their 40s — the city’s Department of Health and Mental Hygiene said the number of fatalities related to swine flu rose to seven.
docs.snippet: With the deaths of two New Yorkers — both in their 40s — the city’s Department of Health and Mental Hygiene said the number of fatalities related to swine flu rose to seven.

keywords.value: Centers for Disease Control and Prevention
keywords.name: organizations

headline.main: 2 More Deaths in City Linked to Swine Flu

docs.abstract: Two more deaths linked to swine flu -- both of adults in their 40s -- were reported by the New York City Department of Health and Mental Hygiene on Wednesday.
docs.lead_paragraph: Updated, 5:27 p.m. | Two more deaths linked to swine flu -- both of adults in their early to mid-40s -- were reported by the New York City Department of Health and Mental Hygiene on Wednesday, bringing the total H1N1-related fatalities in the city to seven.
docs.snippet: Two more deaths linked to swine flu -- both of adults in their 40s -- were reported by the New York City Department of Health and Mental Hygiene on Wednesday.

docs.lead_paragraph: Taxing drinks loaded with sugar is the right step toward fighting the obesity epidemic.
docs.snippet: Taxing drinks loaded with sugar is the right step toward fighting the obesity epidemic.

headline.main: Elderly Faring Better Than Expected With New Flu

docs.abstract: The elderly may have some immunity to the new AH1N1 flu virus if they were exposed to similar viruses in decades past.
docs.lead_paragraph: Any new disease is cause for concern, especially when it's potentially fatal. But the AH1N1 swine flu has confounded expectations by proving unusually benign for the elderly.
docs.snippet: The elderly may have some immunity to the new AH1N1 flu virus if they were exposed to similar viruses in decades past.

headline.seo: 5th in New York City, a Small Child, Dies With Swine Flu
headline.print_headline: Fifth Person in City, a Small Child, Dies With Swine Flu
headline.main: Fifth Person in City, a Small Child, Dies With Swine Flu

docs.lead_paragraph: The death was the first in New York of someone under age 34. Officials were not disclosing in which borough the victim lived.
docs.snippet: The death was the first in New York of someone under age 34. Officials were not disclosing in which borough the victim lived.
